name: Asset Report
query:
SELECT DISTINCT
    `tabAsset`.`name`,
    `tabAsset`.`asset_name`,
    `tabAsset`.`asset_category`,
    `tabAsset Category`.`asset_main_category`,
    `tabAsset`.`purchase_date`,
    `tabAsset`.`gross_purchase_amount`,
    `tabAsset`.`gross_purchase_amount` - `tabAsset`.`opening_accumulated_depreciation` AS "beginning_balance",
    `tabAsset`.`opening_accumulated_depreciation`,
    `tabAsset`.`number_of_depreciations_booked`,
    `tabAsset Finance Book`.`depreciation_method`,
    `tabAsset Finance Book`.`total_number_of_depreciations`,
    (SELECT max(accumulated_depreciation_amount) from `tabDepreciation Schedule` where parent = `tabAsset`.`name` AND journal_entry is NOT NULL AND MONTH(`tabDepreciation Schedule`.schedule_date)=MONTH(%(date)s) AND YEAR(`tabDepreciation Schedule`.schedule_date)=YEAR(%(date)s)) as "total_depreciation_booked",
    (SELECT max(accumulated_depreciation_amount) from `tabDepreciation Schedule` where parent = `tabAsset`.`name` AND journal_entry is NOT NULL AND MONTH(`tabDepreciation Schedule`.schedule_date)=MONTH(%(date)s) AND YEAR(`tabDepreciation Schedule`.schedule_date)=YEAR(%(date)s)) - `tabAsset`.`opening_accumulated_depreciation` as "current_depreciation",
    `tabAsset`.`gross_purchase_amount` - (SELECT max(accumulated_depreciation_amount) from `tabDepreciation Schedule` where parent = `tabAsset`.`name` AND journal_entry is NOT NULL AND MONTH(`tabDepreciation Schedule`.schedule_date)=MONTH(%(date)s) AND YEAR(`tabDepreciation Schedule`.schedule_date)=YEAR(%(date)s)) as "net_book_value"
FROM
    `tabAsset`
    LEFT JOIN `tabAsset Finance Book` ON (`tabAsset Finance Book`.`parent` = `tabAsset`.`name`)
    LEFT JOIN `tabAsset Category` ON (`tabAsset Category`.`name` = `tabAsset`.`asset_category`)
WHERE
    `tabAsset`.`docstatus` = 1
ORDER BY
    `tabAsset`.`gross_purchase_amount` DESC
